markdownContent:
“Can I help you?” rumbles a deep voice behind the door.

“Probably, I'm starting an internship here today and I wasn't sure through which entrance to enter.”

“Ah yes, I heard of you, the student of that crazy professor, right?”

“Right,” you say with a knowing grin.

“My name's Hans Velum, I'm the caretaker of the museum. Shall I take you to Laura?”
